title: Looking For An ADC Main or Team at the rank of silver or gold I am a support main.
body:
I am looking for an adc to duo with or team.

Username: UltraZeros

replies.body:
Hey man,

It's great you're being proactive on the boards and trying to find duo partners, but it isn't a call to spam posts. Spamming is against the board's [Universal Rules](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules) and wont really help your viability much either. In fact, I wouldn't be surprised if a lot of support mains have a bad impression of you now.

We'd appreciate if you could remove the posts now ;)
